```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
# Exercise 1
df_kc <- read_tsv(
  "hg19-kc-count.bed",
  col_names = c("chr", "start", "end", "count")
)

exercise_1_plot <- df_kc %>% 
  ggplot((aes(x = start, y = count))) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(. ~ chr, scales = "free") 

ggsave("exercise1.png", exercise_1_plot, scale = 2)


```
